image

Interface ImageInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Image

    public interface ImageInterface
    Basic interface for images based on a rectangular area of pixels

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeight()
      returns height of the image
      Pixel getPixel(int i, int j)
      gets pixel at coord (i,j) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
      int getWidth()
      returns width of the image
      void setPixel(int i, int j, Pixel pixel)
      sets pixel at coord (i,j) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        returns width of the image
        Returns:
        width of the image

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        returns height of the image
        Returns:
        height of the image

      • getPixel

        Pixel getPixel(int i,
             int j)
               throws UnknownPixelException
        gets pixel at coord (i,j) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Parameters:
        i - the horizontal coordinate
        j - the vertical coordinate
        Returns:
        pixel at coord i,j of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Throws:
        UnknownPixelException - if pixel of coord (i,j) does not exist

      • setPixel

        void setPixel(int i,
            int j,
            Pixel pixel)
              throws UnknownPixelException
        sets pixel at coord (i,j) of this image. (0,0) is top left corner pixel.
        Parameters:
        i - the horizontal coordinate
        j - the vertical coordinate
        pixel - the new pixel
        Throws:
        UnknownPixelException - if pixel of coord (i,j) does not exist
